00017 from tkinter import Menu, PhotoImage
00018 import os
00019 import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
00020 
00021 ## menu() class
00022 #
00023 #  Custom menu which loads an application menu from a XML file
00024 class menu(Menu):
00025     """A custom Menu object which will generate the application menu based on a configuration XML file. \
00026     
00027      Parameters:
00028      * parent application
00029      * XML configuration file
00030      * icons directory path"""  
00031     def __init__(self, master, xmlfile, iconspath):
00032         tkinter.Menu.__init__(self, master=master)
00033         self.master=master
00034         self.master.config(menu=self)       
00035          
00036         self.xmlfile=xmlfile
00037         self.iconspath=iconspath
00038 
00039         self.img=[]
00040                         
00041         self.MenuTree = None
00042         
00043         self.menus    = None # in order to have access to the widgets later  
00044         
00045         self.__createMenuDataStructure() 
00046         
00047         self.__createMenuDisplay()
00048         
00049         self.master.update_idletasks()
00050         
00051     def __createMenuDataStructure(self):
00052         """Extracts the layout information from the XML configuration file."""          
00053         xmlmenu=minidom.parse(self.xmlfile)
00054         MenuXMLRoot=[i for i in xmlmenu.childNodes if (i.nodeName != "#text" and i.nodeName != "#comment")]  # correct approach     
00055 
00056         try:
00057             if MenuXMLRoot == [] or MenuXMLRoot[0].nodeName != "MenuBar": raise RuntimeError
00058         except RuntimeError:
00059             tkinter.messagebox.showerror("Damaged Menu Configuration File", "The menu configuration file have been tampered with it. Will abort operation ...")
00060             self.master.quit()
00061             self.master.destroy()
00062             exit(1)
00063 
00064         self.MenuTree=[[i.attributes["name"].value, i] for i in MenuXMLRoot[0].childNodes if i.nodeName == "Menu"]
00065         self.menus=[[i.attributes["name"].value, i] for i in MenuXMLRoot[0].childNodes if i.nodeName == "Menu"]
00066         
00067         def recursMenuTree(node):
00068             """recursive function to populate the MenuTree"""
00069             menulist=[i for i in node.childNodes if (i.nodeName != "#text" and i.nodeName != "#comment")]
00070             node=[[] for i in menulist] # no longer needed
00071            
00072             for j in menulist:
00073                 if j.nodeName == "MenuItem": 
00074                     node[menulist.index(j)]=[j.attributes["name"].value, list(j.attributes.items())]
00075                 else: # must by a MenuSubDir
00076                     node[menulist.index(j)]=[j.attributes["name"].value, list(j.attributes.items()), j]
00077                     node[menulist.index(j)][2]=recursMenuTree(node[menulist.index(j)][2])
00078             return node        
00079          
00080         for i in self.MenuTree: 
00081             i[1]=recursMenuTree(i[1])
00082 
00083         for i in self.menus: # weird solution but self.menus=copy.copy(self.MenuTree) doesn't work as I expect
00084             i[1]=recursMenuTree(i[1])
00085                 
00086     def createMenuDisplay(self):
00087         """It actually creates the Menu widgets"""
00088         # first create the menu:
00089         for i in self.MenuTree: 
00090             self.menus[self.MenuTree.index(i)][0]=tkinter.Menu(self)   
00091             self.add_cascade(label=i[0], menu=self.menus[self.MenuTree.index(i)][0])
00092         
00093         # recursively add the rest of the menu widget in a similar structure with self.MenuTree
00094 
00095         def recursMenus(menuname):
00096             """recursive function to add the rest of the menu widget."""
00097             # menuname is a two items like [Tkinter.Menu_Instance, [cascade_members]]
00098            
00099             for j in menuname[1]:
00100                 if len(j) == 2: # simple item j[0] is the label of the menu item; j[1] - various options
00101                     
00102                     # consider the possibility of separators:
00103                     if j[0] == "Separator" and j[1][0][1] == "Separator":
00104                         menuname[0].add_separator()
00105                     else: 
00106                         # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00107                         # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00108                         attr={}
00109                         for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]
00110                         try:
00111                             self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))
00112                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00113                         except:
00114                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", self.master, accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00115                         del attr
00116                 else: # must be a MenuSubDir (j[2] contains the items in the MenuSubDir)
00117                     j[0]=tkinter.Menu(menuname[0])
00118                     # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00119                     # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00120                     attr={}
00121                     for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]    
00122                     try:        
00123                         self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))  
00124                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00125                     except:
00126                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", accelerator=attr["accelerator"]) 
00127                     del attr  
00128                     recursMenus([j[0], j[2]])
00129  
00130         for i in self.menus: 
00131             recursMenus(i)   
00132             
00133 if __name__ == "__main__":
00134     from tkinter import tk
